patthana15.58:1.1: Savicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.58:2.1: Savicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
